column2: Reduces incoming damage by 50% for each unique stain you have applied.
Gain +100% critical hit chance which is lost for 60 seconds upon taking damage.
Your Glass Crits perks will be ineffective until this status expires.
Enemies have 5% less health, drop power-ups, and are more common!

Gain +100% critical hit chance which is lost for 60 seconds upon taking damage.
Your Glass Crits perks will be ineffective until this status expires.
Your foes are weaker and drop power-ups!
